page.syntax: $scn(ELEMENT as element/string/array of ELEMENTs, CLASSNAME as string)
page.description: The $scn() function sets the class name of the passed-in element(s). This will overwrite any class names the already being using by the element(s). Contrast this with the $acn() function which adds the class name to the element. (Note: An element can have more than one class name.)
